column5: Welcome to the Aerie Guesthouse! Centrally located on the East Side of Austin on a quiet street, close to UT and downtown. Two-room, two-story, private guesthouse. Queen bed upstairs and queen sofa bed (with real mattress) downstairs. Walk to campus and the Longhorn football and baseball stadiums, or easily bike to downtown, Rainey St, the great restaurants on Manor Rd, as well as 6th St.
